Package jdraw.framework

Interface FigureGroup

  • public interface FigureGroup
    This interface provides access to figure parts for those figures which consist of several parts, as e.g. for group figures.
    Version:
    2.5
    Author:
    Dominik Gruntz & Christoph Denzler

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.Iterable<Figure> getFigureParts()
      Returns the parts of a figure which consists of several parts.

    • Method Detail

      • getFigureParts

        java.lang.Iterable<Figure> getFigureParts()
        Returns the parts of a figure which consists of several parts.
        Returns:
        parts of a figure
